page.title: 05LOCAL CHARACTERS
page.content: {SKATEHORN}was born in Kirkwall 150 years ago.He was the son of a pedlar. He lived rough in fields and never had a job.Before going to sleep he stuffed the holes in the dyke with grass, heather or straw. If it was a cold night he would say he had left the gate open and that was why it was so cold.Everyone loved him and welcomed into their homes and gave him food. {ANNIE HARPER}was a Spey wife from Rendall. She lived in a small cottage with her dogs to keep her company. Annie walked around with a{cubbie}on her back. In this basket she carried all the food people gave to her.She wore pieces of sack tied together with string.All the local people loved Annie and her dogs.
